localization.nonparameteric.Particle¶

class localization.nonparameteric.Particle(state=None, weight=None, Map=None)¶

Bases: object

A basic particle object for use in a particle filter.

__init__(state=None, weight=None, Map=None)¶

Construct a particle.

Parameters

  • state (array or array-like) – the state vector

  • weight (float) – particle’s weight or importance factor

  • Map – the particle’s map version (used for SLAM)

Methods

__init__([state, weight, Map])

Construct a particle.
